@ratio = 1.5 # how wide the flags are compared to their height
@height = 512 
@width =  @[height*ratio]

@five_sixths = @[5/6]
@three_quarters = @[3/4]
@two_thirds = @[2/3]
@half = @[1/2]
@third = @[1/3]
@quarter = @[1/4]
@sixth = @[1/6]

@semy = 0.27

@canton_scale_cross_x = @[ ( 333 / 768 ) + 0.001 ]
@canton_scale_cross_y = @[ ( 205 / 512 ) + 0.001 ]

CRN_kingdom = {
	@CRN_scale = 0.2
	@CRN_offset_x = 0.1
	@CRN_offset_y = 0.15
	pattern = "pattern_solid.dds"
	color1 = "black"
	color2 = "yellow"
	colored_emblem = {
		texture = "ce_circle.dds"
		color1 = "yellow"
		color2 = "yellow"

		# 5 Top
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - (CRN_offset_x*2)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*2)] } 	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - (CRN_offset_x*1)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*2)] } 	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { 0.5 							@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*2)] } 	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + (CRN_offset_x*1)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*2)] } 	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + (CRN_offset_x*2)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*2)] } 	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		# 4
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - (CRN_offset_x/2*3)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - (CRN_offset_x/2)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + (CRN_offset_x/2)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + (CRN_offset_x/2*3)] 	@[0.5-(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		# 3 Middle
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - CRN_offset_x] 	0.5 } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { 0.5 						0.5 } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + CRN_offset_x] 	0.5 } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		# 2
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 - (CRN_offset_x/2)] 	@[0.5+(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		instance = { position = { @[0.5 + (CRN_offset_x/2)] 	@[0.5+(CRN_offset_y*1)] } 						scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
		# 1 Bottom
		instance = { position = { 0.5 					 	@[0.5+(CRN_offset_y*2)] }	scale = { @CRN_scale @CRN_scale }  }
	}
}

		instance = { position = { 0.5 0.5 } scale = { 1.0 1.0 } }				
	}
}
